shrimp.name: Line
shrimp.description: Returns 1 if on the line, otherwise 0
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: x
input.description: x,y give the point to be tested

input.name: y
input.description: x,y give the point to be tested

input.name: x0
input.description: x0,y0 give the 1st endpoint of the line

input.name: y0
input.description: x0,y0 give the 1st endpoint of the line

input.name: x1
input.description: x1,y1 give the 2nd endpoint of the line

input.name: y1
input.description: x1,y1 give the 2nd endpoint of the line

input.name: blur
input.description: The amount the edge is to be blurred

output.name: out
output.description: returns 1 if x,y lies on the line

shrimp.usage: Tests whether a 2d point lies on a 2d Line. Blur can be used to control the antialiasing. The output varies smoothly between 0 and 1 in the blurred region.
